name: ikomobi
description:
ikomobi is a digital agency specializing in mobile, and the "connected life" it enables. We're growing rapidly.
We partner with our clients to help them with the user experience they need to provide to their connected customers or employees. Our core work is to imagine, design, and develop mobile apps and mobile-first websites. Our teams is mostly made of developers. We have four developer teams. They range from two to six engineers and each of these teams is coached by a lead developer.
READ MORE...
